"Weapon Switching PAs":
"Each Hero weapon type has PAs that can switch to the other two weapon types.

To switch weapons, hold the PA button when using one of these PAs. You can use the PA without switching weapons by simply not holding the button."

"When switching weapons with a weapon switching PA, if you have multiple weapons of the type to switch to on your Weapon Palettes, the weapon you switch to will be the one closest to the current weapon's number, in ascending order.

(In the example illustration, the Hero Talis in palette 3 is switching to Hero Twin Machineguns with a PA, and switches to palette 4, the closest one to its own number which has Twin Machineguns.)"
